review.title: “Lack of any trust, fair pay or gratitude towards employees”
review.pros: Pros – -Money - 12K NIS a month, 55 NIS per hour for starters (heard it is less by now)- Teaching - great students, most of them are grateful.- Benefits - car+smartphone. Only if you teach 3 classes at a time (33-40 hrs. a week)
review.cons: Cons – Teaching all over Israel - ALL OVER. will be sent to Efrat in the morning, Petach tikva evening, beer sheva the next morning.a review by students every couple of weeks - very stressful. asked to keep a 6.5 average out of 7.shitty managers. owned by one guy, who will fire you in a second.requires a long time commitment (2 years). they can fire you whenever they want, you have to pay them to quit (20K NIS or more).Students can and will call you any time of day.3 classes - no life!over 80% of staff (not only teachers), last less than 3 years in the company, most of them a lot less.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – give your teachers some respect!
